welcome: Welcome to Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock
instructions:
Instructions:
When prompted, please enter your choice. 
You can also enter the first letter (ie - 'r' for rock). 
In the case of scissor/ spock, please enter the first two letters (ie - 'sc' for scissors, 'sp' for spock)
First to 5 wins.
